multiple_choice.question: Which member is most likely to cheer others up when facing difficulties?
Which member is most likely to struggle with stage fright?
If Kessoku Band needs to write new lyrics, who is most likely to take the lead?
Which band member would most likely try to cheer up Bocchi if she felt anxious?
If the band needed someone to handle public relations or interact with fans, who would be the best choice?
Which member is least likely to panic in a crisis?
Who is most likely to forget their instrument at a practice session?
Who would most likely insist on rehearsing the longest?
Which member is least likely to have financial savings?
Who would most likely be the band's spokesperson in an interview?
If one member were to suddenly change their hair color for fun, who would it most likely be?
Which member is most likely to spend all their money on band equipment and food?
If the band were asked to compose a song about friendship, who would most likely write the lyrics?
Who is the most likely to try to buy expensive gear despite not having enough money?
Which member is the most likely to lose track of time while practicing alone?
If the band had to do a group presentation in school, who would take the lead?
Which member is most likely to try to convince the others to skip practice?
If one of the members had to deliver an inspiring speech to the band, who would be the best choice?
Which band member would be the most enthusiastic about performing in front of a huge crowd?
Which band member is most likely to get distracted and forget the time for an important event?
